DOC.brief_summary: This study compares the effect of two medicines on COPD (Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease). This study will last up to 18 weeks, and subjects will visit the clinic 5 times. Subjects will be given breathing tests, and will record their breathing symptoms daily on diary cards.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Of GW815SF For Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (Chronic Bronchitis, Emphysema)
DOC.detailed_description: Clinical Evaluation of GW815SF for Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (Chronic Bronchitis, Emphysema) "Assessment of the Effect of Addition of Fluticasone Dipropionate to Salmeterol Xinafoate 50µg after Switching under Double-blinded conditions to GW815SF 50/250µg in Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
DOC.mesh_term: Fluticasone Propionate, Salmeterol Xinafoate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Diagnosis of COPD. Exclusion criteria: Diagnosis of asthma or an uncontrolled medical condition or respiratory disorder other than COPD. Other inclusion and exclusion criteria will be evaluated at the first study visit.
